title: Storage Clustering Solution Architect
shortDescription: Joystream Video DAO (https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a Storage Clustering Solution Architect
description:
[Joystream Video DAO](https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a Storage Clustering Solution Architect to design, prototype  and document Kubernetes and CEPH storage node implementation.

**Deliverable:** 

- Design Kubernetes and CEPH storage node implementation for: NFS, block storage and object storage

- Prototype Kubernetes implementation that includes for each storage type:

	- Colossus storage server

	- Query node and joystream-node.

	- Ngnix front end

	- At least three storage CEPH integrated servers.

	- Monitoring: Prometheus, nodeexporter, cadvisor, Grafana and alertmanager.

- Full documentation of the  implementation in Github. 

**Requirements:** 

- High availability

- Having access to highly performant and reliable IT infrastructure.

- Skills: Linux, Docker, Kubernetes, CEPH, docker/docker-compose, nginx or Caddy, GraphQl, Prometheus, git/github, bash/java script/Python

- Dilver within the agreed time frame.

**About WG:** 

Discord channel: https://discord.gg/fFRdNHsW

**Stake:** 

-  1,000 JOY

**Salary:** 

- 30k JOY one time payment upon delivery, some room for negotiation
